cascade package¶

Submodules¶

cascade.model_performance_evaluator module¶

class cascade.model_performance_evaluator.ModelPerformanceEvaluator(proxy_performance, budget)¶

Bases: object

ModelPerformanceEvaluator class for performing stratified simple random sampling, simple random sampling, and poisson sampling, and estimating model performance via the Horvitz-Thompson and difference estimators.

proxy_performance¶

Array of predicted performance values used for stratification.

Type

np.ndarray

budget¶

Number of samples to annotate.

Type

int

allocate_budget(variances_by_strata=None, allocation_type='proportional')¶

Allocate the annotation budget across strata.

Parameters

  • variances_by_strata (np.ndarray, optional) – Variance estimates for each stratum. Required if allocation_type is “neyman”.

  • allocation_type (str) – Type of allocation (“proportional” or “neyman”).

Raises

ValueError – If the budget allocation is invalid.

compute_estimate(observed_performance, estimator='ht')¶

Compute the estimate of the performance and its variance.

Parameters

  • observed_performance (np.ndarray) – Observed performance values for the sampled data.

  • estimator (str) – Estimator type (“ht” for Horvitz-Thompson, “df” for Difference).

Returns

Estimate of the performance and the variance of the estimate.

Return type

tuple

Raises

ValueError – If the sampling method or estimator is unsupported.

sample_data(sampling_method='srs', probabilities=None)¶

Sample data based on the specified sampling method.

Parameters

  • sampling_method (str) – Sampling method (“srs”, “ssrs”, or “poisson”).

  • probabilities (np.ndarray, optional) – Sampling probabilities for Poisson sampling.

Returns

Indices of the sampled data.

Return type

list

Raises

ValueError – If the sampling method is unsupported or probabilities are not provided for Poisson sampling.

stratify_data(clustering_algorithm, features=None)¶

Stratify the dataset using the provided clustering algorithm.

Parameters

  • clustering_algorithm (object) – Clustering algorithm instance (e.g., KMeans).

  • features (np.ndarray, optional) – Feature array for clustering. Defaults to None, which uses proxy_performance.

cascade.oracle_estimator module¶

class cascade.oracle_estimator.OracleEstimator(performance, proxy_performance, total_samples, budget)¶

Bases: object

OracleEstimator class for evaluating variance under different sampling and estimation strategies.

performance¶

Array of actual performance values.

Type

np.ndarray

proxy_performance¶

Array of predicted performance values used for stratification.

Type

np.ndarray

total_samples¶

Total number of samples in the dataset.

Type

int

budget¶

Number of samples to annotate.

Type

int

evaluator¶

Instance of ModelPerformanceEvaluator for performing sampling and estimation.

Type

ModelPerformanceEvaluator

get_srs_variance(outcomes)¶

Compute the variance of the estimates using simple random sampling.

Parameters

outcomes (np.ndarray) – The performance for the HT estimator and performance - proxy_performance for the DF estimator.

Returns

The variance of the estimator.

Return type

float

get_ssrs_neyman_variance(outcomes)¶

Compute the variance of the estimates using stratified sampling with Neyman allocation.

Parameters

outcomes (np.ndarray) – The performance for the HT estimator and performance - proxy_performance for the DF estimator.

Returns

The variance of the estimator.

Return type

float

get_ssrs_proportional_variance(outcomes)¶

Compute the variance of the estimates using stratified sampling with proportional allocation.

Parameters

outcomes (np.ndarray) – The performance for the HT estimator and performance - proxy_performance for the DF estimator.

Returns

The variance of the estimator.

Return type

float
